d.DBDAO

Class JoinedTablesDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • d.DBDAO.JoinedTablesDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JoinedTablesDAO

    public class JoinedTablesDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements JoinedTablesDAO

    implementation of JoinedTablesDAO which enable to contact with the database easily and safely.

    All connections to the database are given by the link ConnectionPool, and then returned to it. No opening or closing of connections are made here.
    This class is used by the Facades Layer of the application.

      • RemoveCustomer

        public void RemoveCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws DAOException
        Description copied from interface: JoinedTablesDAO
        Remove customer and all of its coupon purchase history from Customer_Coupon table. This is done according to the database information and regardless to the coupon collection of the given customer object.
        Specified by:
        RemoveCustomer in interface JoinedTablesDAO
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer to remove.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If customer doesn't exist, or connection lost.
